# addItems(_:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an array of media items to the user’s Shazam library.

## Declaration

```swift
final func addItems(_ items: [SHMediaItem]) async throws
```

## Parameters

- **items**: An array containing the [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem] objects to add to the library.

## Discussion

The library only accepts media items with a [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem/shazamID]. The `shazamID` must be a numeric only string.

This throws [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHError/Code/mediaLibrarySyncFailed] if the system can’t add at least one [doc://com.apple.shazamkit/documentation/ShazamKit/SHMediaItem] or if an error occurred during the addition. In that case, the system doesn’t add any items to the library.

## Managing the items in the library

- **default**: An instance of the default Shazam library.
- **removeItems(_:)**: Removes an array of media items from the user’s Shazam library.
- **items**: The list of synced items in the Media Library.
